about_the_game:
Neon Fever is a 4v4 action arena shooter, with a single weapon: the laser rifle. Use modules to enhance your shots, gadgets to gain new abilities and fight to the death for your team's honor!

Two teams - the Beam Boys and the Laser Lads - compete to be the first to reach 3000 points. Gain points by killing enemy players or by participating in dynamic game modes like King Of The Hill - where your team has to stand its ground in an exposed location - or Chicken Run - where players must catch and hold onto the chicken for a looong time while avoiding enemy shots.

Games last for 10 to 15 minutes and don't leave any time to breath, with a high octane rhythm and high stakes all the way through to the end. The game keeps track of your match history and stats just so you can flex your KD to your friends!

Neon Fever is the first, best, greatest and only game of the Beam Boys team, created as our final group project for the DDJV program at the University of Sherbrooke (2023-2024).

The Beam Boys are (by order of last name):
  • Albin Calais
  • Narvin Chana
  • Martin Dufour
  • Alexandre Lemarbre-Barrett
  • Merlin Roudier
  • Joshua Van Hollebeke
And thanks to Vincent Lévêque for the awesome soundtrack!

All asset licenses can be found in the game files, but most were created by us during development.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5-8300H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Jump, slide and shoot! Kill a player or wipe the entire enemy team with your one-shot-no-scope-super-laser-aiming skills and use gadgets to your advantage, in a 4v4 arena shooter with dynamic game modes and fast paced movement mechanics. May the better team win!
